description: This is a React component called Sidebar that provides navigation and interaction for folders, tags, and user account actions in a note-organizing application. It manages state for adding new folders and triggers callbacks for selecting folders/tags, adding folders, and logging out.

methods.name: Sidebar({ folders = [], tags = [], currentFolder, currentTag, onFolderSelect, onTagSelect, onAddFolder, onLogout, user, })
methods.description: Main React functional component for the sidebar navigation interface, handling folders, tags, and user interactions.
